name: 楊元森
objective: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.
schedule:
Week 1: Deflection using Energy Methods (1)
Week 2: Deflection using Energy Methods (2)
Week 3: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (1) General Procedure
Week 4: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (1) General Procedure
Week 5: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (2) Maxwell's Theorem and Betti's Law
Week 6: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (2) Maxwell's Theorem and Betti's Law
Week 7: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (3): Exercises on Beams and Frames
Week 7: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (3): Exercises on Beams and Frames
Week 8: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (4): Exercises on Beams, Frames, and Trusses
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Symmetric Structures
Week 11: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Influence Lines
Week 12: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Influence Lines
Week 12: Review and exercises
Week 13: Slope-deflection Method
Week 14: Slope-deflection Method
Week 15: Displacement Method: Moment-Distribution
Week 16: Displacement Method: Moment-Distribution
Week 17: Brief of Finite Element Method
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final Exam: 40% +/- 5%
Assignments, lecture notes, interactions etc.: 30% +/- 5%
